DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize , placebo control , multicenter study . Patients randomize receive either oral 4-aminosalicylic acid ( 4-ASA ) placebo twice day 12 week . After 12 week patient improved 4-ASA receive placebo give option receive 4-ASA additional year . Patients randomized receive 4-ASA continue treatment 12 week follow every 3 month 1 year . Patients randomize receive placebo begin 4-ASA therapy 12 week follow monthly 3 month , every 3 month 1 year . Completion date provide represent completion date grant per OOPD record
